metadata.description:
As Allied forces fight the enemy on Europe's war-torn beaches, another
battle begins in a child's bedroom in Brooklyn when the nightmarish
Boogeyman snatches a boy and takes him to the realm of The Dark. The
child's playthings, led by the toy soldier known as the Colonel, band
together to stage a daring rescue. On their perilous mission they will
confront the boy's bitter and forgotten toys, as well as betrayal in
their own ranks. The Stuff of Legend is a haunting and ultimately
redemptive tale of loyalty, camaraderie, and perseverance.
metadata.name: The Stuff of Legend
